fields.name: Passives:
fields.value: - Conversationalist: You start with 4 channel uses instead of 3.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Distract: Choose a player. If they do not win with you, discard a random card from their hand at the end of the phase (Uncertain). [3 uses, 2 CD]
- Captivate: Choose a player. If they do not win with you, cause them to draw 2 less cards at the start of the next phase (Uncertain). [2 uses, 4 CD, Unique] 
- Influence: Choose a player. If they do not win with you, permanently decrease their end of phase draw by 1 (Uncertain). [1 use, Unique, Unlocks D3]
